alert.note: Alert for Accomack; Chesapeake; Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Mathews; Newport News; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Northampton; Suffolk; Virginia Beach; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 11:09PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Accomack, east central Isle of Wight, southeastern York, Northampton and southeastern Mathews Counties, the City of Poquoson, the City of Norfolk, the City of Chesapeake, the City of Hampton, the southern City of Newport News, the City of Portsmouth, the City of Suffolk and the City of Virginia Beach through 1215 AM EST... At 1108 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers with embedded strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mathews to Crittenden to 7 miles northwest of Gates. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mathews, Bavon and Mobjack around 1115 PM EST. Churchland and Northampton around 1120 PM EST. Old Dominion University, Hampton University, Downtown Portsmouth, Portsmouth and Ghent around 1125 PM EST. Ocean View, Downtown Norfolk, Norfolk State University, Norfolk NAS, Fort Monroe, Norview and Buckroe Beach around 1130 PM EST. Virginia Wesleyan University and Norfolk International around 1135 PM EST. Norfolk around 1140 PM EST. Exmore and Nassawadox around 1150 PM EST. Virginia Beach and Willis Wharf around 1155 PM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include South Norfolk, Rudee Heights, Portlock, Moon, Laban, Eastville, Huntersville, Franktown, Chuckatuck and Pungo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Accomack; Chesapeake; Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Mathews; Newport News; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Northampton; Suffolk; Virginia Beach; York
